name: Biters.io
description:
Looking for cool io games?
Enter Biters io game arena and bite others to eat them all!

Can you become the biggest king of the biters?

Bite everything to survive the battle arena!
Eat cookies to grow and drink water to full your dashing skill!

Level up your character and master the simple gameplay of unique .io game concept!
Watch out the competition: Only masters can become the winner!

Ready for surprises? Eat the golden eggs and collect the pieces to unlock very special skins!

Clown Games is a brand of Alictus and is the developer of popular io games available on mobile and web!

Reach us and send your feedback:

https://biters.io
https://youtube.com/clowngames
https://instagram.com/clown.games/
https://clown.gs
publishers: ALICTUS YAZILIM EGITIM BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI ELEKTRONIK SANAYI VE TICARET
